General.Name: Shenzhen Liantronics
General.Description: Shenzhen Liantronics Co.,Ltd develops, manufactures, sells, and services display solutions comprising LED application products in China. The company offers data visualization, indoor commercial, DOOH, outdoor rental, sports, all-in-one, and LED module products. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
